          <title>
            <string language="fi">Painonapit, ylänappi</string>
            <string language="en">Poppa fasteners, upper fastener</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pappabefestiger, oberer Befestiger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attaches de pépère, attache supérieure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prendedores do poppa, prendedor superior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fermi del poppa, fermo superiore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνδεσμοι Poppa, ανώτερος σύνδεσμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sujetadores del poppa, sujetador superior</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Viivapiirroskuvassa ompelussa käytettävän painonapin ylänapit.</string>
            <string language="en">The line drawing shows the upper fasteners used in sewing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fasteners</string>
            <string language="en">upper</string>
            <string language="fi">napit</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeile Zeichnung zeigt die oberen Befestiger, 
die beim Nähen benutzt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La ligne schéma montre les attaches supérieures 
utilisées dans la couture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A linha desenho mostra os prendedores superiores 
usados em sewing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La riga illustrazione mostra i fermi superiori 
utilizzati nel cucito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο γραμμών εμφανίζει ανώτερους συνδέσμους που 
χρησιμοποιούνται στο ράψιμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La línea gráfico muestra los sujetadores 
superiores usados en la costura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Befestiger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ober</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attaches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">supérieur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prendedores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">superior</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fermi</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">superiore</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sujetadores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">superior</string>
          </keyword>
